## PromptHelper.click() method

Creates a prompt that resolves when the player clicks on the given button. The button will be displayed in a message seen only by the prompted player. When resolved, the value specified in `options.return` will be returned.

**Signature:**

```typescript
click<TValue>(object: Button, options: IReturnClickOptions<TValue> & IButtonClickOptions): Promise<TValue>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | [Button](./bge-core.button.md) | <code>Button</code> to be clicked. |
|  options | [IReturnClickOptions](./bge-core.ireturnclickoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;TValue&gt; &amp; [IButtonClickOptions](./bge-core.ibuttonclickoptions.md) | Options to configure the prompt, including the <code>return</code> value. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;TValue&gt;

A promise that resolves to `options.return`<!-- -->.
